What are cookies:
### What are cookies

This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, the types of cookies we use (i.e., the information we collect using cookies and how we use that information), and how to manage the cookie settings.

Cookies are small text files used to store small pieces of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded in your browser. These cookies help us ensure the proper functioning of the website, enhance its security, provide a better user experience, understand how the website performs, analyze what works, and identify areas for improvement.
How do we use cookies:
### How do we use cookies

Like most online services, our website utilizes first-party cookies for various purposes. These cookies are primarily essential for the proper functioning of the website and do not collect any of your personally identifiable data.
What exactly do we store:
### What exactly do we store

* We store information on your **preferred language**, which expires in **1 year**. This data is required your convenience, it is not passed anywhere.

* If you once accepted cookies on our website, we save that in our cookies (expires in **1 year**).
We value your privacy:
### **We value your privacy**

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.
